#summary System Rquirements
#labels Phase-Deploy,Phase-Support

= Required =

  * .NET Framework 2.0
  * Windows 98 Or Higher
  * 12 MB Of RAM
  * 64 KB Of Free Disk Space

= Recommended =

  * .NET Framework 2.0
  * Windows 2000/XP/Vista (Me and 98 do not support unicode)
  * 20 MB Of RAM
  * 400 KB Of Free Disk Space
  * Microsoft Visual C# 2005 Express Edition
